answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Hope diabetes has been ruled out. As, diabetes can cause autonomic neuropathy and affect the digestive system, leading to problems with digestion and elimination. Besides good glycemic control, medications such as cisapride a prokinetic agent are given to promote emptying. If gallbladder ejection fraction is below 35% is considered to be gallbladder dyskinesia. Since it is 58, this can ruled out. Begin with good lifestyle measures to control your symptoms. Exercise regularly. Take frequent small meals. Avoid those foods which are high in oil content. Eliminate alcohol, stop smoking and avoid caffeinated beverages and spicy food.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
